Tavily.query: What is payment of genrative ai devloper in INdia ?
Tavily.answer: A generative AI developer in India earns an average base salary of ₹9 lakhs per year, with ranges from ₹4 lakhs to ₹12 lakhs depending on experience. Higher salaries can reach ₹167 lakhs.

results.title: How Much Do AI Engineers Make? 2025 Salary Guide - Coursera
results.content: In this article, you’ll learn how much an AI engineer earns. What is an average AI engineer’s salary? Falling under the category of Artificial Intelligence Specialist, AI engineers can earn an annual median salary of ₹12,51,419, according to Payscale [2_Specialist/Salary/ef18f689/Artificial-Intelligence-AI)]. According to Glassdoor, the average base salary for an AI engineer in India is ₹11,67,563 per year [3]. AI engineer salaries by experience Here’s how experience can impact your AI engineer salary, according to Payscale: *   Early career (1-4 years): ₹11,00,000 [2_Specialist/Salary/ef18f689/Artificial-Intelligence-AI)] *   Mid-career (5-9 years): ₹24,56,588 [2_Specialist/Salary/ef18f689/Artificial-Intelligence-AI)] AI engineer salaries by industry AI engineer salaries by location Enroll in IBM’s AI Engineering Professional Certificate to learn how to provide business insights from big data using machine learning and deep learning techniques.
